headline: CSX Corporation Announces Increase to Quarterly Dividend
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., Feb. 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CSX Corp. (NASDAQ: CSX) announced that the Company’s Board of Directors approved an eight percent increase in its quarterly dividend, from $0.12 to $0.13 per share. The new $0.13 quarterly dividend is payable on March 14, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on February 28, 2025.
